title: Responsive Navbar Rendering and Functionality
description: Verify that the navbar renders correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, including the mobile menu toggle and WhatsApp contact button functionality.

steps.description: Load the landing page on a desktop screen.
Verify navbar links are displayed horizontally and are clickable.
Resize the window to tablet dimensions.
Verify navbar adapts layout appropriately and remains functional.
Resize the window to mobile screen size.
Verify mobile menu toggle button is visible.
Click on the mobile menu toggle button.
Verify mobile menu expands and navigation links are clickable.
Click the WhatsApp contact button.
Verify that the WhatsApp link opens in a new tab or appropriate app.

title: Hero Section Animation and Content Display
description: Ensure the hero section loads with the intended animations and displays correct welcome content.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page.
Verify that the hero section is visible at the top of the page.
Verify animations play smoothly on page load.
Verify that welcome messages or titles specific to Innova Digital appear correctly.

title: About Section Content Verification
description: Validate that the About section accurately displays company information for Innova Digital and is properly styled.

steps.description: Scroll or navigate to the About section.
Verify presence of the company description text.
Verify text is readable and formatted correctly on all device sizes.

title: Services Section Display and Content Accuracy
description: Confirm that all services provided by Innova Digital are displayed and that content matches the PRD descriptions.

steps.description: Navigate to the Services section.
Verify all listed services appear.
Verify content accuracy and clarity.
Verify section responsiveness across device types.

title: VAP App Section and Launch Countdown Timer Accuracy
description: Verify that the VAP App section displays accurate app info and that the countdown timer reflects the correct time remaining until 19 February 2026.

steps.description: Navigate to the VAP App section.
Verify app information text is present and correct.
Verify the countdown timer displays days, hours, minutes, and seconds remaining until 19/02/2026.
Mock system date to just before and after 19/02/2026.
Validate countdown updates correctly and stops or changes state after launch date.

title: Corporate Responsibility and Values Section Visibility and Content
description: Ensure that the Corporate Responsibility and Values section loads correctly with accurate content.

steps.description: Navigate to the Corporate Responsibility section.
Verify relevant text and images load correctly.
Verify content matches specified company values.
Check layout responsiveness across devices.

title: Contact Form Submission Via FormSubmit
description: Test the Contact form submitting user inquiries successfully through FormSubmit integration.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact form section.
Fill all required fields with valid data.
Submit the form.
Verify form submission success confirmation is displayed.
Verify that the inquiry is received via FormSubmit backend or email.

title: Contact Form Validation and Error Handling
description: Validate that the contact form enforces required fields and proper error messages are displayed for invalid input.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact form.
Try submitting the form with empty required fields.
Verify appropriate validation error messages appear.
Enter invalid email format and attempt submission.
Verify email validation error message is shown.

title: Footer Links and Social Media Redirects
description: Confirm footer displays all company information and social links, and external links open correctly in new browser tabs or applications.

steps.description: Scroll to or navigate to the footer section.
Verify company information is displayed.
Verify social media and external links are present.
Click each social media or external link.
Verify each link opens correctly in a new browser tab or appropriate app.

title: AI Chatbot Interaction Valid Queries
description: Validate that the AI-powered chatbot responds correctly to permitted user queries about company info, VAP App functionalities, launch date, pricing, and contact details.

steps.description: Access the AI chatbot interface.
Input a question about company information.
Verify chatbot replies accurately and relevantly.
Input a question about VAP App launch date.
Verify chatbot provides correct launch date details.
Ask about VAP App pricing.
Verify chatbot responds with accurate pricing information.
Ask for company contact information.
Verify chatbot returns valid contact details.

title: AI Chatbot Rejects Disallowed Queries
description: Verify that the chatbot does not provide responses or redirects user when asked for medical, diagnostic, or clinical advice.

steps.description: Open the chatbot and input a medical advice query.
Verify chatbot replies with a refusal or redirect message, not medical advice.
Input clinical or diagnostic question.
Verify chatbot consistently refuses to provide medical-related responses.

title: Backend API Security - API Key Exposure Check
description: Confirm that sensitive API keys used by backend chatbot services are not exposed in frontend code or public repositories.

steps.description: Review deployed frontend bundle code and source maps.
Verify no API keys or secrets for OpenAI or Google Gemini appear.
Check public GitHub repositories for committed secrets.
Verify environment variable files or secrets are not publicly accessible.

title: Backend API Handling of Chatbot Requests with CORS Enabled
description: Evaluate that the Express backend API properly handles chatbot request processing with CORS configured to allow frontend-origin requests and blocks unauthorized origins.

steps.description: Send a chatbot API request from the authorized frontend origin.
Verify the request succeeds and returns a valid response.
Send a chatbot API request from a disallowed origin.
Verify the request is blocked by CORS policy.

title: Navigation Links Functionality and Mobile Menu Toggle
description: Test that all navigation links scroll or navigate to appropriate page sections and mobile menu toggles on mobile devices.

steps.description: Click each nav link on desktop and verify page scrolls to correct section.
Verify each section is correctly brought into viewport.
Resize window to mobile size and open mobile menu.
Click nav links inside mobile menu.
Verify navigation works and menu closes after selection.

title: 100% Responsive Design Verification Across All Sections
description: Ensure every page section, including Differentials, Footer, and main content, is fully responsive and visually consistent across mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the page on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices or corresponding viewport simulators.
Verify no horizontal scroll bars appear unnecessarily.
Verify text, images, buttons, and components resize and rearrange appropriately.
Verify interactive elements remain accessible and functional.
